title: Typeface for CFO SWAG
content:
Hey guys, I am developing a branding concept for a company that provides CFOs that require a salary of over 100,000 for companies that need a financial leader for the big decisions.

What would be some typefaces and combinations with the strong character of a CFO?:

Strategist, Gentleman, DealMaker, Confidante, Friend, Diplomat, ClassAct, Genius, Wingman, Magician, Manager, Planner, Partner, Intellect, DragonSlayer, Workaholic, Advisor, PitBull Leader.

Much appreciated.
author: kano
